did.unittitle: Daughters of the American Revolution, Battle Pass Chapter records
did.abstract: The Daughters of the American Revolution, Battle Pass Chapter records span the period 1858 to 1954 and include the chapter's bylaws, dated 1913 to 1954; correspondence, reports, and programs, dated 1922 to 1961; address books, photographs, postcards, and brochures of historical sites; the Book of American Creed, dated 1921; and various units of United States currency, dated 1858 to 1872.

bioghist.head: Historical note
bioghist.p: The Daughters of the American Revolution, Battle Pass Chapter was organized in Brooklyn, N.Y. in 1905.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The Daughters of the American Revolution, Battle Pass Chapter records span the period 1858 to 1954 and measure 0.2 linear feet. Included in the records are the chapter's bylaws, dated 1913 to 1954; correspondence, reports, and programs, dated 1922 to 1961; address books, photographs, postcards, and brochures of historical sites; the Book of American Creed, dated 1921; and various units of United States currency, dated 1858 to 1872.
